ui.title: TFGBV Global Resources
ui.subtitle: Educational resources ken international guides maipapan iti online safety ken Technology-Facilitated Gender-Based Violence (TFGBV).
ui.local_support_title: Masapulmo kadi ti immediate support iti Pilipinas?
ui.local_support_desc: Nag-compile kami ti specialized local resources para kadagiti survivors ti online harassment ken gender-based violence.

chayn.name: CHAYN’s DIY Online Safety Guide
chayn.description: Maysa a comprehensive, survivor-led guide tapno agtalinaed a safe online, sakupenna dagiti topics manipud panag-secure ti accounts agingga iti panang-handle ti harassment.

australia_esafety.name: Australia’s E-Safety Guide
australia_esafety.description: Maysa a world-leading resource nga mangtaltalakay kadagiti key topics ti online safety, karaman ti deepfakes, cyberbullying, ken image-based abuse.

unfpa.name: UNFPA: TFGBV Considerations
unfpa.description: Maysa a critical resource nga addaan titulo a: "Technology-facilitated gender-based violence: Considerations across the life course", nga mangus-usisa ti impact ti digital harm.

fma.name: Foundation for Media Alternatives (FMA)
fma.description: Maysa a Philippine-based NGO nga naka-focus iti intersection ti technology ken human rights. Addaanday ti specific resources maipapan ti gender-based violence ken dedicated helpline.

cnxus.name: She Leads Curriculum on TFGBV
cnxus.description: Maysa a specialized educational curriculum nga naaramid tapno i-empower dagiti leaders ken advocates nga solbaren ti technology-facilitated gender-based violence.

svri.name: SVRI Global Library
svri.description: Maysa a nalawa a repository ti research ken resources nga dedicated iti intersection ti technology ken gender-based violence.
